sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { StatusBar, Text, Pressable, View, Image, ScrollView, Alert } from 'react-native'; import Ripple from 'react-native-material-ripple'; const AccueilPlanfication = ({ navigation }) => { const B = (props) => {props.children} const [showBox, setShowBox] = React.useState(true); return ( navigation.navigate('Menu')} style={{alignItems: 'flex-end', marginRight: 20}}> Mes planifications Chauffeur : Nom Prénom Véhicule : nom Plaque : XXXX-XXXX Date : XX/XX Heure : XXH XXmin Alert.alert("","Êtes vous sûr de vouloirs annuler cette planification ?",[{text: "OUI", onPress: () => {setShowBox(false);},},{text: "NON",},])}> Annuler navigation.navigate("Recherche")}> Planifier ); }; export default AccueilPlanfication;
